TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_tmangux_abax, title = tmangux_abax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/tmangux_abax} }

S.FORM: tmangux abax ginringan qa mbhkux payat kayal qani ga tmangux abax, garing saying byaling cyugal ski magal ryax ga t'aring qa tmangux abax qani. garing magal byaling magal ski pitu ryax gas i say maha tmsuqan qa tmangux abax qani la, tmangux abax laga si baqi maha sinpngan ryax qa gaga na sm'atu la Iyik qa tmangux abax qani, skura tltu qa cinbwanan qani ga nyan scobih hayi wagi, nyan si bnwan wagi krryax, ana kayal qani ga nyan mkilux uyi, nyan msqsya qa tlaka qani, baq hmor qsya qa llyung uyi. tmangux abax laga garing tmangux qabax abax ghoniq ro k'man uyi la, nyan si sphpah qa phpah qani, nyan sinhelax qabax qa qsinux qani, kpiyux sinbtwan qa qqsinux qani ga wayal sbatu uyi la. qbhniq qani ga shri plkan binah na˙san, musa skura tltu na rroq qa musa mbhuyax kya nanak, mllamu na qsinux qsinux ga twang qsliq smoya mipu, tliqan kilux qa kayal ro piny'ugan na cinbwanan qani ga nyan maga; pin'yugan "inlungan" na cquliq ki pin'aaray yaw na hi ta uyi.

tmangox abax ginringan qa mbhkox payat kayal qani ga tmangox abax, garing saying byaling cyogal ski magal ryax ga t'aring qa tmangox abax qani. garing magal byaling magal ski pito ryax gas i say maha tmsoqan qa tmangox abax qani la, tmangox abax laga si baqi maha sinpngan ryax qa gaga na sm'ato la Iyik qa tmangox abax qani, skora tlto qa cinbwanan qani ga nyan scobih hayi wagi, nyan si bnwan wagi krryax, ana kayal qani ga nyan mkilox oyi, nyan msqsya qa tlaka qani, baq hmor qsya qa llyong oyi. tmangox abax laga garing tmangox qabax abax ghoniq ro k'man oyi la, nyan si sphpah qa phpah qani, nyan sinhelax qabax qa qsinox qani, kpiyox sinbtwan qa qqsinox qani ga wayal sbato oyi la. qbhniq qani ga shri plkan binah na˙san, mosa skora tlto na rroq qa mosa mbhoyax kya nanak, mllamo na qsinox qsinox ga twang qsliq smoya mipo, tliqan kilox qa kayal ro piny'ogan na cinbwanan qani ga nyan maga; pin'yogan "inlongan" na cqoliq ki pin'aaray yaw na hi ta oyi.
